parameter.name: monitorId
parameter.label: Monitor ID
parameter.description: The ID of the monitor in ZoneMinder.

parameter.name: monitorTriggerTimeout
parameter.label: Trigger timeout
parameter.description: Timeout in seconds when running triggered recording. Default is 60 seconds

parameter.name: monitorEventText
parameter.label: Event Text
parameter.description: Text in the message send to ZoneMinder. Default is 'OpenHAB triggered event'
